title: We have an employment system for recent graduates and those with no experience in IT engineering.

data.title: Qualifications
desc: Graduates or expected graduates from junior colleges, four or six-year universities or graduate schools, as well as those who have graduated or completed vocational training schools (applicants with work experience are also welcome).
Nationality is not a barrier (Japanese language proficiency is required).
Proficiency in English is highly welcome.
No experience is okay! We value an honest and proactive attitude towards work.
list: Applicants of any nationality are welcome (Japanese language proficiency is required).
Proficiency in English is highly welcome.
No experience is okay! We value an honest and proactive attitude towards work.

data.title: Ideal Candidate
list: Effective communication and coordination skills with team members and clients.
A sense of responsibility, with the ability to handle tasks accurately, seriously, and sincerely.
Capable of advancing work responsibly while coordinating with the surroundings.
Proactively takes on new challenges.
Adaptable to business changes.

data.title: Remuneration
list: Starting salary from 180,000 yen per month (experience is preferred).
※ Regular employee hiring is available.
No experience is okay! We value an honest and proactive attitude towards work.

data.title: Welfare Benefits
list: Various social insurance coverage.

data.title: Holidays
list: Annual holidays of 120 days or more.
Complete two-day weekend (Saturday and Sunday).

data.title: Application Method
list: Fill out the resume template and send it to the email address above.
Proficiency in English is highly welcome.
No experience is okay! We value an honest and proactive attitude towards work.

data.title: Development Engineer
desc: Experienced candidates will be entrusted with diverse tasks, including projects for major clients and cutting-edge fields.
Applicants with experience in the design and development of various systems are welcome (inexperienced individuals are also welcome).
list: Development Languages: Java, PHP, VB.Net, PRA, PEGA, C, etc.
Databases: Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL
Operating Systems: Windows, Linux

data.title: Operations and Maintenance Engineer
desc: Responsible for maintaining and monitoring various systems, addressing issues during operation, etc.
list: System operation monitoring
Security measures
Data backup
Troubleshooting and bug recovery
Adding applications
Client terminal management

data.title: Infrastructure Engineer
desc: Basic and administrator functions of Win and Linux
Knowledge of TR/SW functions at CCNA level
Business knowledge at the level of JP1 certified engineers, and administrator functions of various consoles
list: Design, construction, and maintenance of network and servers
Requirements definition, design, and construction of My Number System subsystems
Server operation monitoring for cloud services
Design and construction of virtualized environments
Operation and maintenance of network equipment
Introduction, design, and construction of databases, and many more

data.title: Monitoring Engineer
desc: Responsible for maintaining and monitoring various systems, addressing issues during operation, etc.
list: Operation monitoring and primary recovery agency for various servers
System operation and command operations following procedure manuals
Negotiation and reporting with customers and consignors
Compilation of various business tasks
Progress management and reporting
